definitions.title: interj.
definitions.body: ( from [[אָהּ]] and [[נׇא]], q. v.) a strong part. of entreaty, ah, now ! I ( or We) beseech thee! oft. sq. an imper.; Ge 50:17 (to Joseph) ´[[אָנׇּא שָׂא נׇא וג]] Ah, now ! forgive, we pray, etc., Ex 32:31 (to God); elsewhere always sq. ´[[י]] or [[אֲדׂנׇי]] Ps 118:25, Ps 118:25, Ne 1:5, Ne 1:11, Da 9:4. Written [[אֽנּ֫֫ה]] 2Ki 20:3 (= Is 38:3) Jon 1:14, Jon 4:2, Ps 116:4, Ps 116:16.
